channel.title: Need a help to integrate my companies internal ticketing tool with Stackstrom
channel.description:
Requirement: Auto ticketing is enabled in my internal ticketing tool and i need stackstorm should pick ticket from ITSM and trigger anisble playbook.
thanks in advance!!! Raghuvel Sekar 9052332558 raghuvel.sekar@netenrich.com
